Ingredients.8: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat a casserole dish with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, 3 to 5 minutes. Add beef and increase heat to medium-high. Cook and stir until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and discard grease.

Directions.3: Combine refried beans and burrito seasoning in a bowl and mix well. Add mixture to the beef in the skillet and stir well.

Directions.4: Mix cream of mushroom soup and sour cream together in a bowl.

Directions.5: Place a layer of chips into the prepared casserole dish to just cover the bottom. Follow by 1/2 the meat mixture, 1/2 the soup mixture, 1 cup shredded Mexican cheese blend, and 1/2 the salsa. Repeat layers and top with remaining cheese.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until hot and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes.
